ygData.subject: RE: [EQBards] Just a thought.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Doesn t sound like a mistake to me. Harmony means more than just a succession of chords according to the rules of progression and modulation . It can be
ygData.messageBody:
Doesn't sound like a mistake to me. Harmony means more than just "a
succession of chords according to the rules of progression and modulation".
It can be applied to literary works, facts and opinions, physics and
mathematics and, in the case of Monks, body, mind and soul.

And the Cane befits a Monk more than a Bard - just think of Caine (sp?) in
'Kung Fu'... he used a walking stick of some sorts, didn't he?

-KS

>The new bard 1HS looks amazing, I've always wanted to look like a
Final Fantasy character. Just a thought though on the new monk
only Cane of Harmony. Anyone else think this is a mistake? I'm
just thinking perhaps they input another wrong number in the
database and made this item monk only and not bard only:

Cane of Harmony
MAGIC ITEM
Skill: 1H Blunt Atk Delay: 25
DMG: 12
STR: +4 DEX: +4 CHA: +8 INT: +8
WT: 3.2
CLASS: MNK
Race: ALL
